informationNeed.text: prefix text: <http://jena.apache.org/text#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> Select ?document ?score1 ?score2 ?scoretot where { ?document dc:language 'spa' . ?document dc:type ?t . FILTER(?t = 'TAZ-TFG' || ?t = 'TAZ-TFM') . ?document dc:date ?y . FILTER(?y >= '2003') . ?document dc:description ?desc . optional {(?document ?score2) text:query (dc:description 'anima' ) } . optional { (?document ?score1) text:query (dc:description 'vision por computador' ) } . bind (coalesce(?score2,0) as ?scoretot) } ORDER BY DESC (?scoretot)

prefix foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/> prefix text: <http://jena.apache.org/text#> prefix dc: <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> Select ?x ?score2 ?scoretot where { optional {(?x ?score2) text:query (dc:type 'TAZ-TFG' )}. bind (coalesce(?score2,0) as ?scoretot) } ORDER BY DESC(?scoretot)
